result.title: dfs calls
result.content:
Hello everyone :

i want to say that the dfs calls' priority can turn a WA code to an AC code. eg

this code is WA

[[http://codeforces.com/contest/199/submission/32220545](WA code)] and this one is AC [[http://codeforces.com/contest/199/submission/32220513](AC code)]

the only difference between them is the arrangement of the dfs calls.

if anyone know how should i put the calls in the right format please tell me as it costs me alot of WA till i know the AC code.
